tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Hello Everyone,
I did have problem in my wisdom teeth, and it has to be extracted. Dr. Sushan Sharma had explained the procedure before extraction, and He was talking while performing the procedure which made me feel relaxed. I am posting this little bit late, as I wanna tell my complete experience from extraction to recovery. The extraction was done on 16 June 2022, and I felt OK as local anesthesia was given. For the next 2 days I took only ice creams and fruit juices, and started taking mild food thereafter. Usually most of the people gets their face inflammation after tooth extraction, but I didn‚Äôt get any inflammation (may be due to my personal immunity). Sutures had been removed on 24 June 2022, doctor said there‚Äôs no infection. Due to tooth removal a hole will be formed which will take 30-45 days for complete sealing. So, it‚Äôs been 3 weeks and I feel no pain at all, but I am taking complete care so that food particles will not go in the hole.
I had a better experience with the hospital (Kirpa Dental, West Patel Nagar), and the doctor (Dr. Sushan Sharma). Thank you doc, I feel better now‚Ä¶
Thank you all‚Ä¶
reply_text: Thankyou for your kind words üôèüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
In this pandemic situation, Dr Sushen is taking every precaution. He has maintained utmost standards of hygiene. Body temperature is checked, you are thoroughly sanitised, your slippers are taken off at the gate. 
So I was facing sensitivity issue since a long time. On examination by Dr Sushen he told me this is due to the wisdom tooth which has grown improperly and only permanent solution is to extract the tooth.

So we scheduled the surgery. He was ready when I visited the clinic. The surgery went around 1 hour and things were done quite smoothly. He patiently performed surgery. After the surgery he recommended some medicines. I have been taking medication and feeling much better. 
Though he cautioned me of pain and swelling however I haven‚Äôt felt much of this. 
He is having high expertise and the way he explains the things in simple manner is phenomenal. 

I am a satisfied patient and duly recommend him.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words dear Vibhas. Wish you an even more speedy recovery üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I've come here to give an honest review about wisdom tooth extraction so that whoever is getting afraid of such surgery will get relaxed after listening my story. 
I m a student nd I'm 26yrs old. One day I started feeling so much pain at right corner of my mouth ( initially I thought it would be some ulcer) nd then I consulted with Dr. Sushen, he did X ray nd I saw wisdom tooth was coming in opposite direction Then the doctor gave me medicine but I did not get relief from pain then
I went for wisdom tooth extraction but I had feared too. Dr. made me so calm and when the doctor started the procedure, no pain was felt for one and a half hours. Yes you will feel pressure during the procedure but there will be no pain at all. Throughout the process Dr. calming me too.  Today it's been 1 week and I am fine and no pain. One more thing, after surgery whenever I felt need he was just a call away.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind and honest words üôè
